column4: i goto https://help.ubuntu.com/community/CompositeManager dont understand what to do
but i think i have compiz not compiz-fusion
but i cant find the fire effect when closing window
and how to make a wallpaper in background when i rotate the cube?
then double click the current effect to edit
you want burn when you close?
now for the shydome, go to the desktop cube --> appearance --> skydome
checking the number of people in respective channels (#ubuntu and #fedora) will give you a slight idea...
my suggestion is to try a distro that seems to interest you. You will learn a lot. Decide for yourself. don't just listen to anyone who says that one distro is the best
